about_the_game:
Step into the untamed heart of the Old West with SUNDOWN, Panache Studios' fast-paced action game. In this adventure, the once-thriving town of Tire lies in ruins, as a rugged investigator returns to be tasked with uncovering the mystery that turned a sunlit vibrant town into a desolate land. 

Choose Your Path: in SUNDOWN, every choice shapes your thinking towards the truth. The game introduces scene interactions, allowing you to pick your investigative approach. Each decision unravels a piece of the puzzle. As you piece together clues scattered across the forsaken town, you'll uncover the gripping tale behind its downfall.

Fast-Paced Hit-and-Run Combat: Surviving the treacherous Old West demands quick reflexes and cunning strategy. SUNDOWN brings adrenaline-pumping hit-and-run gameplay that keeps players on their toes. Use speed and agility to gain the upper hand against a relentless foe who lurk in the shadows. The better you shoot, the faster they get!

With its narrative, intense action, and the immersive charm of the Old West, Sunrise promises to redefine what it means to be a hero in a land where survival is a game of wits and grit.

Prepare to write your legend in SUNDOWN.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.0
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: SUNDOWN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or Radeon RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
